channel.title: CBN.com - The 700 Club - Video Podcast
channel.description: A daily television program featuring Pat Robertson, Terry Meeuwsen, and Gordon Robertson. On the air continuously since 1966, the 700 Club is one of the longest-running programs in broadcast history.

item.title: The 700 Club - February 27, 2026
item.description: Alcohol abuse destroyed a police officer's family and nearly his life as he lay in a coma, getting more than the medical staff was offering. But watch as God decided to step in, today on the 700 Club.
